title: The Heroine Ran Away! the Villainous Daughter Has to Break off Her Engagement and Tame Her Watchdog Mage - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Royalty   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Hiiragi Ichiha   柊 一葉
description:
When I reincarnated, I was the villainous daughter, Viara.
Why a villain?!! I don't want to die!

Let's hand over the stupid good-looking prince to the heroine.
With enough money to buy a castle, I don't need him!

That's what I thought....
The heroine unexpectedly abandoned the story. She didn't even enter the Academy!!

'What is a villainous lady without a heroine?'

There is no heroine, but that doesn't mean the death flag disappeared.
What do you mean by that?! 

The engagement was supposed to end in a peaceful way.
But the prince is a womanizer and I won't tolerate that!

My father adopted something for me... A mage that acts like a guardian dog?
A watchdog mage and a villainous daughter.

'How did this happen?! '

It's a romantic comedy.>
